General: - Various adjustments to orb spawning behavior (a bit less horizontal motion and some more variance and details to its motion)
- New categories added to builds are now wider by default
- Added a console command: deadlock_get_old_builds, which will download and print out all of the build data for your account prior to the new builds feature

Viscous: - Added a directional arrow particle effect to {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball for Viscous
- Added additional particles while using {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball
- Fixed hit detection on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch and Goo Ball
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch having 2x the range of the tooltip.
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch being able to target behind puddle
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch using Guardians as a surface to punch from
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch Range reduced from 70m to 60m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20}} Splatter now deals less damage if it hits the same target multiple times. 66% damage for the second hit, 33% damage for the third hit.

Goo Ball: - Added a directional arrow particle effect to {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball for Viscous
- Added additional particles while using {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Goo Ball|Size=20}} Goo Ball
- Fixed hit detection on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch and Goo Ball
Puddle Punch: - Fixed hit detection on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch and Goo Ball
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch having 2x the range of the tooltip.
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch being able to target behind puddle
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch using Guardians as a surface to punch from
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch Range reduced from 70m to 60m
Splatter: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Splatter|Size=20}} Splatter now deals less damage if it hits the same target multiple times. 66% damage for the second hit, 33% damage for the third hit.
